name: Coven (itch) (CovenTeam)
description:
Take on the world as Rowena, a young witch who is searching for her mother in a troubled world. Dangerous foes challenge Rowena to grow stronger and master both sword and sorcery. While on the trail,  Rowen will discover her heritage by recovering grimoires and uncovering her mother's history. 

The current build of Coven features the first chapter of Rowena's story.
